Traits.Name: Overdrive 4
Traits.Description: Deals boosted damage if the current round is 4 or higher.

Traits.Name: Slow
Traits.Description: Go after all other characters. If multiple characters take slow turns, it takes the same order as regular turns (ally/enemy/ally).

Traits.Name: Aetherwall
Traits.Description: Cover from ranged attacks further away than range 2.

Traits.Name: Resonance
Traits.Description: Attacks deal boosted damage if they hit 3 or more targets.

Traits.Name: Power Overwhelming
Traits.Description: If overdrive has triggered, gain flying and vigor 1.

Actions.Name: Blast
Actions.Hit: Deal heavy damage and inflict blight.

Actions.Name: Flash
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 must save or take fray damage and be blighted.
